name: Glowing Meadow
description:
Welcome in Glowing Meadow!
A LudumDare40 game - The more you have, the worse it is

You've just been awaken to free the three other guardians, in order to revive the Ancient Oak and bring peace and inconsciousness back into the Garden.

To do so, you'll have to grow as much glowing plants as possible, while slashing the darks weeds to avoid them to take control of your sacred place.

Oh, by the way. Do not forget to water your plants, a wildfire can start easily!

Controls - Actions :
-  Water plants: SPACE BAR
- Cut: E 

Controls - Powers :
-  Speed Boost: B
-  Summon plants: V
-  Summon Rain: C
